info.title: Cinematic PoS API
info.description: API contract for the PoS System

post.summary: Create a company. This is how the administrator of the PoS system (super-manager) initially onboards a new company.

delete.summary: Delete a company. This should have a cascading effect on all of the resources under the deleted company.

get.summary: List all inventories with a possibility to filter based on the item or the store

post.summary: Create an inventory. When a store wants to sell some item, it must create an inventory (for that store/item pair).
Create an order. This should also create ItemOrders for each of the specified item in the request

put.summary: Update the status of an order

post.summary: Assign an employee to an order
Add an additional item order to a specific order. This might be needed if a user wants to add something that they didn't think of when requesting the order initially

delete.summary: Delete an item order belonging to a specific order. This might be needed if a user changes up their mind and no longer wants this item order as part of their order.

get.summary: Get item orders with a possibility to retrieve only the ones without any worker assigned.

put.summary: Update the status of a specific item order
Assign a worker a specific item order

get.summary: Fetch a receipt for a payment

post.summary: Process a refund for a payment

get.summary: List all appointments with a possibility to show all appointments for a certain day

post.summary: Create an appointment. This is done by a manager/employee to create a "time slot" for a specific service.

workerId.description: Specifies the worker that will be fulfilling this appointment, e. g. masseuse, barber

orderId.description: If there is no OrderId specified, this appointment (time slot) should be considered unoccupied

Appointment.description: Acts as a time slot for a specific service.

workerId.description: Specifies the worker that will be fulfilling this appointment, e. g. masseuse, barber

Company.description: Represents a legal entity that has made a deal with the PoS system and has been onboarded to the PoS system

Inventory.description: Represents the physical amount of a specific item in a specific store

description.example: Savor the symphony of flavors with our Super Delicious Hot Dog  a perfect union of grilled, premium sausage, golden toasted bun, and a medley of condiments. Elevate your hot dog experience with our signature toppings, from melted cheese to crispy bacon, creating a culinary masterpiece that promises to delight your taste buds on every bite.

ItemDiscount.description: Holds the discount information directly linked to item

description.example: Savor the symphony of flavors with our Super Delicious Hot Dog  a perfect union of grilled, premium sausage, golden toasted bun, and a medley of condiments. Elevate your hot dog experience with our signature toppings, from melted cheese to crispy bacon, creating a culinary masterpiece that promises to delight your taste buds on every bite.

ItemOption.description: Specifies an "extra" that you can add on to an item

workerId.description: Specifies the employee that takes care of this particular ItemOrder, e.g. a chef

LoyaltyOffer.description: Holds the information on offers for loyalty programme

gratuity.description: How much the user is willing to leave as a tip

workerId.description: Specifies the employee that administers the Order

itemOrders.description: Specifies the ItemOrders of this Order

totalAmount.description: This value is derived from the prices of Items and Appointments

tax.description: This value is summed up from the taxes of Items and Appointments

Order.description: Models an existing Order (one that has already been requested)

OrderDiscount.description: Holds the discount information directly linked to order

gratuity.description: How much the user is willing to leave as a tip
How much the user is willing to leave as a tip

items.description: ItemOrders for this Order should be generated from these items

OrderRequest.description: Alongside generic order information, also specifies items that should be included in the order when creating it

description.example: Our skilled stylists create a welcoming atmosphere, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable grooming session. With attention to detail and a playful touch, we craft trendy and age-appropriate hairstyles, making every visit a delightful adventure for your child.

ServiceDiscount.description: Holds the discount information directly linked to service

description.example: Our skilled stylists create a welcoming atmosphere, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable grooming session. With attention to detail and a playful touch, we craft trendy and age-appropriate hairstyles, making every visit a delightful adventure for your child.

token.description: JWT token (base64 encoded string). Alongside information about the user (name, email, id), it should also contain their roles.

UserLoginInformation.description: Used to log in the user to gain a token

Bearer.description: Please insert JWT with Bearer into field
Bearer.name: Authorization
